transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan ji, Swarnim International mein baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay sir, good morning. Main Pallavi baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir, kal aap se baat hui thi na? Aap bata rahe the ki aap satisfied nahi hai, dikkat aa rahi hai aapko IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh sir, main chah rahi thi ek baar aap na online aaiye. Main aapko kuch shortcuts batati hoon IndiaMART ke buyers se.
Customer: Mujhe koi bhi shortcut aapka nahi jaanna hai.
Executive: Sir, sir bahut hi, sir easy hai bahut IndiaMART ka panel.
Customer: Mujhe kuch bhi nahi, mujhe sab dekh liya, sab shortcut dekh liya hai. Mujhe sirf paisa return chahiye. Woh aapne kal kaha tha ki possible nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi, nahi woh possible hai. Hum, hum jo koshish kar rahe the ki paisa return.
Customer: Karwao aap paisa return. Main le lunga na. Aap kyun pareshan ho rahi hai? Nahi ho payega toh aap phone rakh do.
Executive: Paisa return nahi ho payega. Aapka jo paisa laga hua hai, uska utilization.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir, aapka jo paisa laga hua hai, uska utilization hum bata sakte hain. Aapki service chal rahi hai.
Customer: Woh main le lunga. Aap Pallavi ji, aap pareshan na ho. Woh main le lunga. Aapka concern nahi hai yeh.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Theek hai? Hmm. Woh main le lunga paisa.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Toh aap kaise lenge aap sir paise?
Customer: Main le lunga.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Mere paas raste hain lene ke paise.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Jab tak aap paise nahi le payenge, tab tak toh aap service use kariye na.
Customer: Nahi, bilkul nahi lunga service. Ek din ki service nahi lunga.
Executive: Kyun sir?
Customer: Aap phone rakhiye. Aap mujhe phone rakhiye. Aap mujhe disturb na karein. Paisa lene ki baat hai, main paisa le lunga. Theek hai.
Executive: Achha. Chaliye, theek hai. Okay sir.
Customer: Chaliye, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund for the subscription.

- Does not want to use the service.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about service utilization.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, service, utilization
